string.text: a mythical stalker known only as 'Demonized', who they say ventures to the deepest parts of the zone to bring back artifacts free of charge for those who have a worthy purpose for them.
the rumors of a madman living on top of one of the piles of trash in garbage, killing anyone he encounters on sight. A man so vile he was banished from the renegades.
